name: Punch
description:
Little Hal’s 3-string cigar box acoustic/ electric guitars are unique in appearance and sound according to the condition of the cigar box used for the build.  All guitars are built from authentic used cigar boxes and include all the wear and tear of the boxes maintaining each box’s character.  Each guitar is a one-of-a kind or a limited edition of high craftsmanship.
•	They have a 25” scale nut to bridge
•	The nut and bridge are free floating – adjustments can be made easily
•	The inside of the box is accessible if the strings are taken off (nut and bridge will fall off)
•	The strings are heavy resonator guitar strings from GHS (makes it hard to play traditional guitar)
•	The strings are the 3rd, 4th, and 5th strings of a guitar and can be tuned accordingly for traditional playing
•	The nut can be replaced or the nut “seat” can be filed down to lower the “action”
•	The neck is maple and the fretboard is red oak
